segments.text: I see the girl standing there, just waiting for her brother to hand her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so innocent, like she’s not even part of the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she knows exactly what she’s doing, though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her hand is outstretched, and she’s watching the jar like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s ever fallen trying to do this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is getting closer to them, and she doesn’t seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she gets her cookie before the whole thing comes crashing down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s so focused on the jar, she might not even notice if her brother falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm she is while everything around her is a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s the smart one, letting her brother do all the risky work.
segments.speaker: PAR
